name: vaccination-certificate-test-suite
description: Demonstrates the extensibilty of VCs as immunization certificates.

scripts.test: mocha tests/ --require esm --reporter ./node_modules/mocha-w3c-interop-reporter/index.js --reporter-options body="$PWD/body.hbs",reportDir="$PWD/reports",respec="$PWD/respecConfig.json",title='Vaccination Credentials Interoperability Report 1.0',reportLog='./report.log' --timeout 15000
scripts.test-node: mocha tests/ --require esm --reporter mochawesome ./node_modules/mocha-w3c-interop-reporter/index.js --reporter-options body="$PWD/body.hbs",reportDir="$PWD/reports",respec="$PWD/respecConfig.json",title='Vaccination Credentials Interoperability Report 1.0' --timeout 15000
scripts.fetch-who-int-svc: if [ ! -e .who-data/svc ]; then git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/who-int/svc.git .who-data/svc; fi
